topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5445a28763687209aef70100#post_5445a28763687209aef70100
Definitely some good ideas for sure. I know I thought of Akuma's cave from Street Fighter Alpha 3 as his background. With Fortinbras as the final boss, his background is based off the settings of the final battle for Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams, completely with the Omen Star hovering in the background.
topics.author: 5056c9e87f123b37f6012a34

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5445a63a6368727a8bc50100#post_5445a63a6368727a8bc50100

Not sure. I know I thought of having various Jump and Capcom characters appear in the backgrounds as well as in endings and the like. I know with Luffy, I've had him having backup from Zolo/Zoro, Nami, Usopp, Sanji, Chopper, Robin, Franky, and Brook in his Level 3 Hyper Combo, Straw Hats Ahoy!.
